title: 91/486/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 September 1991 amending Decision 90/135/EEC relating to the plans of certain third countries concerning examination of residues of fresh meat for substances other than those having a hormonal action
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 4 September 1991  amending Decision 90/135/EEC relating to the plans of certain third countries concerning examination of residues of fresh meat for substances other than those having a hormonal action  (91/486/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 90/135/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 September 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 134, 29. 5. 1991, p. 45. (3) OJ No L 275, 26. 9. 1986, p. 36. (4) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1989, p. 11. (5) OJ No L 76, 22. 3. 1990, p. 24. (6) OJ No L 267, 29. 9. 1990, p. 46.
